Negotiation & Influencing
View this email in your browser
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As part of the ENS International {!Job__c.Public_Program_Name__c} program you are attending on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} in {!Job__c.Venue_City__c}, please read the following information to help empower your negotiation success.
Date: {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} Time: {!Job__c.Start_Finish_Time__c} Venue: {!Job__c.Venue_Name__c} {!Job__c.Venue_Address__c} {!Job__c.Venue_City__c} {!Job__c.Venue_Country__c} Venue Map Program Leader/s: {!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c} {!Job__c.Facilitator_emails__c} Dress: Smart casual Learning Outcomes: Click here to see the Learning Outcomes
The ENSI Program is not only about giving you the skills required to approach negotiations confidently but to also ensure that your learnings are sustained and become a force of habit. We believe that engaging you before and after the workshop will increase your learning outcomes and ask that you participate fully in the activities outlined below.
We like to promote an informal atmosphere during the workshop and casual dress is welcome. Lunch will be provided and there will be suitable breaks during the program to enable participants to communicate with business colleagues and clients.
If you require accommodation, please let me know and we can recommend some hotels close to the venue. Also, please advise me within 7 days if you have any special dietary requirements
Pre-Program Requirements
No prior reading material is necessary. A comprehensive workbook will be made available at the beginning of the workshop.
Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Job__c.PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Click here* to access the questionnaire.
Please come briefed with notes on at least one current negotiation situation (for use in diagnosis and review sessions during the workshop).
*Please note that this link is specific to you, please don't forward it to others.
Post-Program Actions
+ You will receive 5 reinforcement emails sent fortnightly. + All attendees on our programs are automatically subscribed to our eBulletin Negotium. Negotium takes real-world negotiations and builds on them, providing commentary and tips that you can apply in your work and personal life. We have designed it to be useful to our past participants and those with a general interest in negotiation.
Terms of business
Participant Cancellation Policy
More than 30 days - full refund Less than 30 days - no refund Substitute participant accepted without charge up to 48 hours before program commencement
Date Transfer Requests
Under 30 days incur $300 + GST transfer charge Maximum of 1 transfer permitted per participant Transfers are not accepted within 14 days or less prior to commencement date Discounts/Promotions are non-transferable
ENSI reserves the right to cancel any program without notice.
Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any queries on these arrangements.
We look forward to seeing you at the workshop!
Kind regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Title}
